video.title: Wizards vs. Aliens
video.synopsis: Young wizard Tom and his brainy buddy Benny protect the Earth's magic from aliens in this tongue-in-cheek series from the creators of "Doctor Who."

episodes.synopsis: Sixteen-year-old wizard Tom Clarke and his grandmother are abducted when an alien race, the Nekross, begins draining Earth's sorcerers of their power.
episodes.title: Dawn of the Nekross, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After escaping from the alien ship, Tom is recaptured along with his father and best friend Benny, and plots a daring breakout of his fellow wizards.
episodes.title: Dawn of the Nekross, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Benny must combine their magic and scientific knowledge to defeat a fearsome Grazlax dispatched to Benny's house by the Nekross.
episodes.title: Grazlax Attacks, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Tom's magic is at its limit, Benny's out of scientific ideas and the Grazlax are multiplying out of control, leading to desperate measures.
episodes.title: Grazlax Attacks, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As Tom learns from fellow wizard Jackson Hawke, who uses magic a little recklessly, a Nekross prince sneaks in and captures Benny.
episodes.title: Rebel Magic, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Benny grows concerned with Jackson's hold on Tom, especially when Ursula reveals that Jackson uses an unpredictable and dangerous form of magic.
episodes.title: Rebel Magic, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Lexi the Nekross disguises herself as human and befriends Tom before both are abducted by Stephanie Gaunt, a billionaire with a villainous plan.
episodes.title: Friend or Foe, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As Stephanie Gaunt works to combine Nekross technology and magic, the aliens and wizards must unite to save Lexi and Tom from her clutches.
episodes.title: Friend or Foe, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Benny devises a plan to destroy the Nekross, but it also cuts off life support on their ship, dooming the abducted wizards on board.
episodes.title: The Fall of the Nekross, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Benny believes that the Nekross should be spared, but his compassion gets him kidnapped and Tom must use all his wizardly powers to rescue him.
episodes.title: The Fall of the Nekross, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Tom begins to have visions of his late mother, leading him to a sinister Nekross plot to clone her and collect her magic powers.
episodes.title: The Last Day, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Tom's mother's spirit helps him and his friends destroy the Nekross's cloning labs and send them back to their home planet.
episodes.title: The Last Day, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Benny meet Chloe, a street magician who's a big hit online, and realize she's a wizard who doesn't understand her powers.
episodes.title: 100 Wizards, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Chloe, Tom and Benny work together to free the wizards imprisoned by the force field and fight back against the Nekross.
episodes.title: 100 Wizards, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: While visiting a haunted house, Tom and Benny meet a Hobbledehoy named Squiggley who turns Benny into a wizard and Tom into a science nerd.
episodes.title: Vice Versa, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After the Nekross destroy Squiggley, Tom learns that it'll take another Hobbledehoy to undo the spell and restore him to his normal self.
episodes.title: Vice Versa, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Tom is injured while experimenting with magic, he journeys with Michael and Ursula to a cave in Tibet in search of a cure.
episodes.title: The Cave of Menla-Gto, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The guardian of the cave believes Tom is the key to wizardry's future and works to heal him. Meanwhile, Benny and Randal are captured by the Nekross.
episodes.title: The Cave of Menla-Gto, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When wizards Madeleine and Gemma Raven are captured by the Nekross, Gemma agrees to cast a spell on Tom in exchange for their release.
episodes.title: The Curse of Crowe, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Gemma's spell puts Tom and Benny at odds, which prevents them from fighting back against the Nekross, Ursula tries to intervene.
episodes.title: The Curse of Crowe, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Benny goes to work for a company that makes computer games and learns that people have been disappearing from the building for years.
episodes.title: The Thirteenth Floor, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Lexi's relationship deepens as they spend time together on the Neverside, and Ursula must come to their rescue.
episodes.title: The Thirteenth Floor, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Nekross enact an evil plan during a solar eclipse that plunges Earth into permanent darkness, stripping the wizards of their powers.
episodes.title: Endless Night, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Tom is prepared to sacrifice himself to the Nekross to save Earth, but Benny may have found a way to put the moon back into its orbit.
episodes.title: Endless Night, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Varg uses a family of wizards to carry out an evil plan, Ursula is gravely injured, and Benny and Tom are taken captive.
episodes.title: All Out War!, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Lexi begins to understand that she needs Tom on her side, and the two work with Benny and Varg to defeat Jathro 15 and Kooth.
episodes.title: All Out War!, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Tom and Benny notice that their teachers and classmates don't seem like themselves, they discover evidence of alien activity.
episodes.title: The Secret of Room 12, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With the evil alien Prospector threatening to destroy Earth, Tom resorts to making a deal with Varg and his new wife, Lady Lyzera.
episodes.title: The Secret of Room 12, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A Nekross ship crashes in the woods, releasing bugs that track the wizards. Meanwhile, Benny is invited to meet with scientist Adam Wright.
episodes.title: The Quantum Effect, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When the telescope is activated and Michael is taken prisoner, Ursula creates a spell that gives Tom the knowledge he needs to override the telescope.
episodes.title: The Quantum Effect, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Katie's grandfather comes face-to-face with a witch in an abandoned theater, she asks for Tom's help and learns he's a wizard.
episodes.title: The Daughters of Stone, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Tom's long-lost grandfather, wizard Simeon Swann, returns from the Neverside to help him save Ursula from Old Bethesda.
episodes.title: The Daughters of Stone, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Simeon, Tom and Michael seek out the Key of Bones, which can block creatures from the Neverside trying to cross over into the world.
episodes.title: The Key of Bones, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Tom, Simeon and Michael encounter the mysterious Quest Master and tangle with the Nekross on their search for the Key of Bones.
episodes.title: The Key of Bones, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Randal Moon learns from Caractacus Crowe, one of Ursula's ancestors, that the evil Warlock may be released from the Neverside.
episodes.title: Twilight Falls, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With help from their new friend Jazz, Tom and Moon struggle to escape from the Nekross before doing battle with Warlock.
episodes.title: Twilight Falls, Part 2
